Testing code

Author:
Alice
Date:
06 Oct 2013
Category:
control-systems-team

Here is an example of what code would look like inline -- std::cout << "Hello world" << std::endl;. There is, unfortunately, no syntax highlighting. You can use a code block instead:

#include <iostream>

int main() {
    std::cout << "Hello world" << std::endl;
    return 0;
}
